description.brazilian: Você fotografou 10 animais.
description.english: You've photographed 10 animals.
description.french: Vous avez photographié 10 animaux.
description.german: Du hast 10 Tiere fotografiert.
description.japanese: 10種類の動物の写真をとった。
description.schinese: 你给 10 只动物拍了照。
description.spanish: Has fotografiado 10 animales.

description.brazilian: Você fotografou 20 animais.
description.english: You've photographed 20 animals.
description.french: Vous avez photographié 20 animaux.
description.german: Du hast 20 Tiere fotografiert.
description.japanese: 20種類の動物の写真をとった。
description.schinese: 你给 20 只动物拍了照。
description.spanish: Has fotografiado 20 animales.

description.brazilian: Você tirou uma foto de todos os animais da ilha. Parabéns!
description.english: You took a picture of all the animals of the island. Good job!
description.french: Vous avez photographié tous les animaux du jeu. Bravo !
description.german: Du hast von jedem Tier auf der Insel ein Foto geschossen. Gut gemacht!
description.italian: Hai fatto una foto a tutti gli animali dell'isola. Ben fatto!
description.japanese: 島のすべての動物の写真をとった。グッジョブ！
description.koreana: 섬의 모든 동물의 사진을 찍었습니다. 잘했어요!
description.polish: Zrobiono zdjęcie wszystkim zwierzętom na wyspie. Dobra robota!
description.russian: Вы сфотографировали всех животных острова. Хорошая работа!
description.schinese: 你给岛上全部的动物拍了照。做得好！
description.spanish: Has hecho una foto de todos los animales de la isla. ¡Buen trabajo!
description.tchinese: 你拍了島上四周所有動物的照片。厲害！

description.brazilian: Você coletou 50 unidades de lixo
description.english: You've picked up 50 pieces of trash
description.french: Vous avez ramassé 50 déchets.
description.german: Du hast 50 Mal Müll eingesammelt
description.japanese: ゴミを50個拾った。
description.schinese: 你捡起了 50 件垃圾。
description.spanish: Has recogido 50 trozos de basura.

description.brazilian: Você coletou 500 unidades de lixo. Continue assim!
description.english: You've picked up 500 pieces of trash. Carry on!
description.french: Vous avez ramassé 500 déchets. Continuez !
description.german: Du hast 500 Mal Müll eingesammelt. Weiter so!
description.japanese: ゴミを500個拾った。その調子！
description.schinese: 你捡起了 500 件垃圾。继续！
description.spanish: Has recogido 500 trozos de basura. ¡Sigue así!
description.tchinese: 你撿了500個垃圾，繼續努力！

description.brazilian: Você coletou 880 unidades de lixo. Impressionante!
description.english: You've picked up 880 pieces of trash. Impressive!
description.french: Vous avez ramassé 880 déchets. Impressionnant !
description.german: Du hast 880 Mal Müll eingesammelt. Beeindruckend!
description.japanese: ゴミを880個拾った。すごい！
description.schinese: 你捡起了 880 件垃圾。厉害！
description.spanish: Has recogido 880 trozos de basura. ¡Impresionante!
description.tchinese: 你撿了880個垃圾，佩服佩服！

description.brazilian: Você limpou a baía.
description.english: You've cleaned up the bay.
description.french: Vous avez nettoyé la baie.
description.german: Du hast die Bucht gesäubert.
description.japanese: ベイをすっかりきれいにした。
description.schinese: 你打扫干净了海湾。
description.spanish: Has limpiado la bahía.

description.brazilian: Você limpou a enseada.
description.english: You've cleaned up the creek.
description.french: Vous avez nettoyé la crique.
description.german: Du hast die schmale Bucht gesäubert.
description.japanese: 入り江をすっかりきれいにした。
description.schinese: 你打扫干净了小海湾。
description.spanish: Has limpiado la ensenada.

displayName.japanese: サンゴしょうの掃除（そうじ）

description.brazilian: Você limpou o atol.
description.english: You've cleaned up the atoll.
description.french: Vous avez nettoyé l'atoll.
description.german: Du hast das Atoll gesäubert.
description.japanese: サンゴしょうをすっかりきれいにした。
description.schinese: 你打扫干净了环礁。
description.spanish: Has limpiado el atolón.

displayName.japanese: 岩しょうの掃除（そうじ）

description.brazilian: Você limpou o recife.
description.english: You've cleaned up the reef.
description.french: Vous avez nettoyé le récif.
description.german: Du hast das Riff gesäubert.
description.japanese: 岩しょうをすっかりきれいにした。
description.schinese: 你打扫干净了珊瑚礁。
description.spanish: Has limpiado el arrecife.

description.brazilian: Você limpou a ilha.
description.english: You've cleaned up the island.
description.french: Vous avez nettoyé l'île.
description.german: Du hast die Insel gesäubert.
description.japanese: 島をすっかりきれいにした。
description.schinese: 你打扫干净了岛屿。
description.spanish: Has limpiado la isla.

description.brazilian: Você concluiu 10 missões secundárias.
description.english: You've completed 10 side quests.
description.french: Vous avez complété 10 quêtes secondaires.
description.german: Du hast 10 Nebenaufgaben erfüllt.
description.japanese: サイドクエストを10個クリアした。
description.schinese: 你完成了 10 个支线任务。
description.spanish: Has completado 10 misiones secundarias.

description.brazilian: Você concluiu 50 missões secundárias. Ótimo!
description.english: You've completed 50 side quests. That's great!
description.french: Vous avez complété 50 quêtes secondaires. Super !
description.german: Du hast 50 Nebenaufgaben erfüllt. Das ist klasse!
description.japanese: サイドクエストを50個クリアした。すごい！
description.schinese: 你完成了 50 个支线任务。了不起！
description.spanish: Vous avez complété 50 quêtes secondaires. Super !
description.tchinese: 你完成了50項支線任務，太棒了！

displayName.spanish: Ángel de la guardia de la isla

description.brazilian: Você concluiu 80 missões secundárias. Incrível!
description.english: You've completed 80 side quests. Amazing!
description.french: Vous avez complété 80 quêtes secondaires. Incroyable !
description.german: Du hast 80 Nebenaufgaben erfüllt. Unglaublich!
description.japanese: サイドクエストを80個クリアした。ステキ！
description.schinese: 你完成了 80 个支线任务。太棒了！
description.spanish: Has completado 80 misiones secundarias. ¡Impresionante!
description.tchinese: 你完成了80項支線任務，令人讚嘆！

description.brazilian: Você fotografou o naufrágio.
description.english: You've photographed the shipwreck
description.french: Vous avez photographié l'épave de la baie.
description.german: Du hast das Schiffswrack fotografiert.
description.japanese: 難破船の写真をとった。
description.schinese: 你给遇难船只拍了照。
description.spanish: Has fotografiado el naufragio

description.brazilian: Você fotografou o domo das tartarugas na enseada.
description.english: You've photographed the turtle dome in the cove.
description.french: Vous avez photographié le dôme de la tortue de la crique.
description.german: Du hast die Schildkrötenkuppel in der Bucht fotografiert.
description.italian: Hai fotografato la cupola tartaruga nella Cala.
description.japanese: 入り江にあるカメのドームの写真をとった。
description.koreana: 동굴 안의 거북 돔의 사진을 찍었습니다.
description.russian: Вы сделали фото черепахового свода в бухте.
description.schinese: 你给海湾上的海龟圆顶屋拍了照。
description.spanish: Has fotografiado la cúpula de la tortuga en la cueva.
description.tchinese: 你拍了小海灣海龜拱頂的照片。

description.brazilian: Você fotografou os corais-cérebros no atol.

description.russian: Вы сделали фото коралла-мозговика на атолле.

description.spanish: Has fotografiado el coral cerebro en el atolón.
description.tchinese: 你拍了環礁腦珊瑚的照片。

description.brazilian: Você obteve 10 páginas de conhecimento.
description.english: You've got 10 pages of knowledge.
description.french: Vous avez obtenu 10 pages de savoir.
description.german: Du hast 10 Seiten Wissen erhalten.
description.japanese: 10ページ分の知識を学んだ。
description.schinese: 你得到了 10 页知识笔记。
description.spanish: Has conseguido 10 páginas del conocimiento.

description.brazilian: Você obteve 24 páginas de conhecimento.
description.english: You've got 24 pages of knowledge.
description.french: Vous avez obtenu 24 pages de savoir.
description.german: Du hast 24 Seiten Wissen erhalten.
description.japanese: 24ページ分の知識を学んだ。
description.schinese: 你得到了 24 页知识笔记。
description.spanish: Has conseguido 24 páginas del conocimiento.

description.brazilian: Você obteve 48 páginas de conhecimento. Que poço de ciência!
description.english: You've got 48 pages of knowledge! What a fount of knowledge!
description.french: Vous avez obtenu 48 pages de savoir. Quel puit de science !
description.german: Du hast 48 Seiten Wissen erhalten. Eine wahre Quelle der Wissenschaft!
description.italian: Hai trovato 48 pagine di conoscenza. Un vero pozzo di scienza!
description.japanese: 48ページ分の知識を学んだ！まさに科学の井戸！
description.polish: Masz 48 stron wiedzy. To prawdziwa kopalnia informacji!
description.russian: Вы получили 48 страниц знаний! Просто кладезь науки!
description.schinese: 你得到了 48 页知识笔记。真是个知识达人！
description.spanish: Has conseguido 48 páginas del conocimiento. ¡Vaya pozo de sabiduría!
description.tchinese: 你獲得了48頁知識筆記！這可是科學寶庫！

description.brazilian: Você obteve o poder da tartaruga.
description.english: You've got the power of the turtle. Cowabunga!
description.french: Vous avez obtenu le pouvoir de la tortue.
description.german: Du hast die Macht der Schildkröte erhalten.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto il potere della tartaruga.
description.japanese: カメのパワーを手に入れた。
description.schinese: 你得到了海龟的力量。
description.spanish: Has conseguido el poder de la tortuga.

description.brazilian: Você obteve o poder do golfinho.
description.english: You've got the power of the dolphin.
description.french: Vous avez obtenu le pouvoir du dauphin.
description.german: Du hast die Macht des Delfins erhalten.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto il potere del delfino.
description.japanese: イルカのパワーを手に入れた。
description.schinese: 你得到了海豚的力量。
description.spanish: Has conseguido el poder del delfín.

description.brazilian: Você obteve o poder da raia.
description.english: You've got the power of the ray.
description.french: Vous avez obtenu le pouvoir de la raie.
description.german: Du hast die Macht des Rochens erhalten.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto il potere della manta.
description.japanese: エイのパワーを手に入れた。
description.schinese: 你得到了鳐鱼的力量。
description.spanish: Has conseguido el poder de la raya.

description.brazilian: Você obteve o poder do tubarão.

description.japanese: サメのパワーを手に入れた。
description.schinese: 你得到了鲨鱼的力量。

displayName.italian: Ti diamo il benvenuto a Maupiroa
displayName.japanese: マウピロアへようこそ
displayName.spanish: Te damos la bienvenida a Maupiroa

description.brazilian: Você passou seu primeiro dia na ilha.
description.english: You've spent your first day on the island.
description.french: Vous avez passé votre première journée sur l'île.
description.german: Du hast deinen ersten Tag auf der Insel verbracht.
description.italian: Hai passato il primo giorno sull'isola.
description.japanese: 島で1日過ごした。
description.russian: Вы провели первый день на острове.
description.schinese: 你在岛上度过了第一天。
description.spanish: Has pasado tu primer día en la isla.
description.tchinese: 你在島上度過了第一天。

description.brazilian: Você é o quinto totem!
description.english: You are the fifth totem!
description.french: Vous êtes le cinquième totem !
description.german: Du bist das fünfte Totem!
description.japanese: あなたが5番目のトーテムだ！
description.schinese: 你是第五图腾！
description.spanish: ¡Tú eres el quinto tótem!
